Device.Name: ST7735S
Device.Description: An ST7735S Character LCD is a factory industry standard thin film transistor (TFT) LCD display device designed for interfacing with embedded systems. These screens come in a variety of configurations including 128x160, which has two kinds of color mode, 65k-color and 262k-color mode, some include backlight provided by a LED.
Device.KeyWord: ST7735S, LCD, TFT, Character LCD, Text LCD, 320x240, display
